definition: not alone but in pairs (idiom, usually derog.); not a unique occurrence/it's not the only case
toy figurine/action figure/stuffed animal/doll/(fig.) sb's plaything

sentences.english: After each day I would just put the sweaty clothes into the same bag.
sentences.chinese: 每天偶都把汗滋滋的球衣放到包里。

sentences.english: I graduated from junior high school star, I lively and cheerful character, witty humor.
sentences.chinese: 偶毕业于红星初中，偶哒性格活泼开朗，风趣幽母霈。

sentences.english: I think it"s hard to believe."
Irll stay at home unless Irm invited.
sentences.chinese: 除非俺获邀请，否则偶就留在家里。

sentences.english: No, I heard she's married with two kids.
sentences.chinese: 不，偶听说她已使君有夫，还有两个孩子。

sentences.english: One woman in a fading Japanese village is slowly replacing its dead residents with scarecrows.
sentences.chinese: 正在凋落的日本村庄中，一位妇人用布偶重现旧人。

sentences.english: I'm just a flame without the heat.
sentences.chinese: 偶只是一束没有热量的火焰。

sentences.english: I have played Jiri three times and have never beaten him.
sentences.chinese: 偶跟基里比赛过三次，但是从来木有赢过他。

sentences.english: I must assure you that it wn' t happen again.
sentences.chinese: 偶必须向您确保，这种事情不会再次发生。

sentences.english: After a round walk in Shi Gu Ping village, my heart was fully broken.
sentences.chinese: 到石古坪村转一圈之后，偶的心却是彻底地碎了。

sentences.english: Why do you look at me amazed, mother?
sentences.chinese: 你为啥惊讶地望着偶呢，母亲？

sentences.english: LL: Li Hua, are you giving me the runaround ?
sentences.chinese: 看你说的，偶乍样是在找借口呢偶看你有点多疑吧。

sentences.english: These properties can be regarded as the construction methods of generalized relative difference set pairs.
sentences.chinese: 这些性质也可以看作是广义相对差集偶的构造方法。

sentences.english: Today, in class, I was sitting next to the guy that I fancy.
sentences.chinese: 今天，上课的时候，偶坐在了偶稀饭的葛格旁边。

sentences.english: Today, in class, I was sitting next to the guy that I fancy.
sentences.chinese: 今天，上课的时候，偶坐在了偶稀饭的葛格旁边。

definition: phonetic a, similar to 呵/-azine, see 吖嗪[a1 qin2]
(archaic) light, bright (variant of 冏[jiong3])/(since c. 2005) (slang) emoticon signifying embarrassment, shock, helplessness etc
(onom.) quack/honk/(northern dialect) very/also pr. [ga1 ga5], [ga2 ga5] etc
the bleating of sheep/final particle which transforms statements into questions that indicate doubt or surprise (Cantonese)
(interjection expressing surprise, grief etc)/variant of 嘻[xi1]
cup/(slang) (pun on 悲劇|悲剧[bei1 ju4], tragedy) so bad/terrible/bummer/fiasco/debacle
move the mouth as in speaking
(onom.) for the sound of a bird, an empty stomach etc
to blacken/abbr. for 涅槃[nie4 pan2]
